summary: Consume Automizy API to manage contacts and lists.

parameters.name: deprecated
parameters.description: Indicates if the service is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (Contact or List).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the contact.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: Choose the list or specify an ID using an expression.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating a contact.
